name: Lazy Wizard (Vojmir)
description:
Greetings Normal Lazy Wizard!
You've Embarked on a Lazy Journey Through The Lands!
In this Journey, You Can Only Move Using Your Teleport Spell.
Your Goal is to Make It to The End of The Lands Using The Limited Number of Lives & Teleport Spells at Your Disposal.
Be Wary of Hazards Along the Way, These Will Cause You to Lose Lives if Touched!

A School Project Designed & Developed by 4 classmates in the span of 2 weeks.

Developers:
Vojmir Vladilo-Molina
Chance Richardson
Isaac Schwartz
Jiwon Wang
